牝.definition: (of a bird, animal or plant) female; keyhole; valley

牝牡驪黃.definition: a black stallion or possibly a yellow mare (idiom); don't judge by outward appearance

牝雞司晨.definition: female chicken crows at daybreak (idiom); a woman usurps authority; women meddle in politics; The female wears the trousers.

牝雞牡鳴.definition: female chicken crows at daybreak (idiom); a woman usurps authority; women meddle in politics; The female wears the trousers.
